title: (x) WRCLA - Brueghel (stretched) {Grant}
content:
Can anyone help with this?   
I only have this letter combination.........   
   
 ![wrcla.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001119im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26651.jpg)   
   
Thanks,   
gln
author: gln

comments.content: It's hard to tell exactly from the resolution of the image provided, but a very close match would be URW's [Breughel Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001119/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/breughel/black/testdrive.html?s=WRCLA&p=48) that has been stretched 175% horizontally.
